FuncDef: This command creates a cipher list that the client sends to the server in the client Hello message. It is a list of ciphers that are supported and preferred by the SR OS to be used in the TLS session. The server matches this list against the server cipher list. The most preferred cipher found in both lists is chosen.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the client cipher list, up to 32 characters in length.
Keyword used to create the client cipher list.
